body_html: There are a lot of high priority tasks that we're going to tackle first, but we can provide help in case someone wants to submit a PR. It would be nearly equivalent to that of @ethanluoyc, except that digamma is not part of the C/C++ library, so one would have to find a good CPU/CUDA implementation (on an open source license).
body_text: There are a lot of high priority tasks that we're going to tackle first, but we can provide help in case someone wants to submit a PR. body: There are a lot of high priority tasks that we're going to tackle first, but we can provide help in case someone wants to submit a PR. It would be nearly equivalent to that of @ethanluoyc, except that digamma is not part of the C/C++ library, so one would have to find a good CPU/CUDA implementation (on an open source license).
